messages.title: A personal message from Michelle Lowe

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Securing a better future for Coventry North East
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building a strong and vibrant economy which delivers more jobs and lower taxes. Ensuring a good start in life for everyone including good schools & more apprenticeships. Protecting the NHS so we all enjoy high quality health care including longer GP opening hours.

issues.economy: Building a strong and vibrant economy which delivers more jobs and lower taxes.
issues.education: Ensuring a good start in life for everyone including good schools & more apprenticeships.
issues.health: Protecting the NHS so we all enjoy high quality health care including longer GP opening hours.

images.caption: Michelle Lowe with different groups of people

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains criticisms of Ed Miliband and the potential of a coalition with the SNP, Liberal Democrats, and other parties if the Labour Party were in power, under the heading 'COALITION OF CHAOS'.
